bilingual.source: In a relative sense, he is right.
bilingual.target: 在相对的意义上，他是对的。
他们的观点是相对的，不是固定的。
他的成功是相对的，不是绝对的。

bilingual.source: Success is relative; it depends on what you value.
bilingual.target: 成功是相对的；这取决于你重视什么。

bilingual.source: Happiness is relative and varies from person to person.
bilingual.target: 幸福是相对的，因人而异。

bilingual.source: The importance of this issue is relative to the context.
bilingual.target: 这个问题的重要性是相对的，取决于上下文。

bilingual.source: The speed of the car is relative to the speed limit.
bilingual.target: 车速是相对的，与限速有关。

bilingual.source: The cost of living here is relative to the average income.
bilingual.target: 这里的生活成本是相对的，与平均收入有关。
速度是相对的，静止也是相对的。

list.abstract: relative（英 [ˈrelətɪv]，美 [ˈrelətɪv]），英语单词，作形容词为相关的；比较的；互比的。作名词为血亲；姻亲；亲属。例句：I took his relative silence to be offensive.（我认为他的相对沉默是无礼的。） relative的近义词有opposing、proportional、kin，反义词有absolute。
relative是一个英语单词，可以用作形容词和动词，可以翻译为相关的、相对的，等等。

yingyinNormal.en: Monster Is a relative term. To a canary, a cat is a monster. We're just used to being the cat.
yingyinNormal.zh: “怪物”是一个相对的词语，对于金丝雀来说 猫就是怪物，我们只不过是习惯把自己当猫罢了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's really the first time I've had an objective structure around the film saying that time literally is relative that we all experience time differently depending on where we are in the universe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这真的是第一次围绕电影网有一个目标结构讲述时间实际上是相对的，我们经历的时间都不一样，取决于我们在宇宙的什么地方。
男生队，轮到你们了。“日常琐事”。

yingyinNormal.en: Used to work with her. Used to. I'm a relative and I didn't get invited. A blood relative. Blood. Stop saying, "Blood" to strangers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 以前的同事，以前，我是她的亲戚却没有被邀请，我是她的血亲，血。别在陌生人面前提到“血”。

yingyinNormal.en: Relativity is about everything we do. We can't do anything that is not relative.
yingyinNormal.zh: 相对论存在于万物之中没有比较什么都做不好。

yingyinNormal.en: Thus, time must tick at different rates for people moving relative to each other.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以 当人们对他人相对地移动时，时间一定以不一样的速率流逝。

yingyinNormal.en: Come with me. 40 years ago, I created a formula that altered atomic relative distance. Huh?
yingyinNormal.zh: 跟我来，四十年前，我发明了一个公式，可以改变原子之间的相对距离。什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Every family in America has a relative holed up in a garage somewhere huffing paint thinner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在美国谁家都会有个亲戚干点不大光彩的事情。

yingyinNormal.en: Pheeb, come on, isn't there any relative that would have the recipe? What about your sister?
yingyinNormal.zh: 难道你家的亲戚都没有食谱吗？你妹妹呢？

yingyinNormal.en: The categories are, Fears and Pet Peeves, Ancient History, Literature, and It's All Relative.
yingyinNormal.zh: 考题项目如下： “恐惧和怪癖”，“陈年往事”，“文学”和“日常琐事”。

yingyinNormal.en: Before we begin, let me just establish the fact that I don't know much relative to what I need to know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我们开始之前，我要向说个事实，我需要明白的还有很多。

yingyinNormal.en: Weddings pop up, relative die, people need help, the amount of misery happens at the end of the semester. It's just incredible.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要参加各种婚礼，亲戚去世了，有人需要帮助等等仿佛这一系列悲剧都不约而同地发生在期末。

yingyinNormal.en: Humoring a relative? No, no, scheduling my life down to the last minute. I mean, look at this, "Call New York office, 4:17 p.m."
yingyinNormal.zh: 纵容自己的亲人瞎胡闹吗？不是，我在安排我人生中的每一分钟，你看看这个下午4点17分打电话给纽约办公室。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. It's the apparent change in the frequency of a wave caused by relative motion between the source of the wave and the observer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当声源和观察者之间的距离发生变化时，波动的频率也会发生明显变化。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey Joey. Hey. Can I talk to you for a second? This kid in this picture. Do you, know this kid? Is that like a relative or something?
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔伊。可以跟你谈一下吗？你认识照片里这个小孩吗？他是你的亲戚吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, our position is 34.48 degrees north, 118.31 west. That means the azimuth should be 168.22 degrees relative to magnetic north with an elevation of 49.93.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的位置是北纬34.48°，西经118.21°，这意味着方位角应该是相对磁北168.22°，外加仰角49.93°。

yingyinNormal.en: But guess what? Soon enough you get just a bigger house and a bigger neighborhood and you start compare yourself against in relative turn to the house next to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 出乎意料的是你刚刚住进了更大房子和更大的社区不久，就开始跟你的邻居比较起来。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't tell you which path in life is best for you, because I don't know how important it is for you to achieve big goals relative to how important it is for you to avoid the pains required to get them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我无法说出生活中哪条路最适合你，因为我不知道对于你相对于达成目标中避免辛苦，达成重大目标有多重要。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. It tells us that you participate in the mass cultural delusion that the sun's apparent position relative to arbitrarily defined constellations at the time of your birth, somehow affects your personality.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，我们可以了解到，你有群众性文化妄想，就是指你出生时相对于任意确定星座的太阳的视位置，可能会决定你的性格。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: considered in relation or in proportion to something else

examination_example.sentence: If left to themselves, such trends will diminish the <highlight>relative</highlight> strength of the English language in international education markets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果听之任之，这种趋势将削弱英语在国际教育市场上的相对优势。

examination_example.sentence: This doesn't, however, make interpretation merely <highlight>relative</highlight> or even pointless.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这并不会使理解变得相对化，甚至毫无意义。

sense_info_list.en: a person related by blood or marriage; a species related to another by common origin

examination_example.sentence: FaceTime with a <highlight>relative</highlight> as you strength train or stretch at home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在家进行力量训练或伸展运动时，与亲戚进行视频聊天。

examination_example.sentence: If you have no friends or <highlight>relatives</highlight>, try to participate in several online communities, full of people who are always willing to share advice and encouragement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你没有朋友或亲戚，试着参加几个在线社区，那里都是愿意分享建议和鼓励的人。

sense_info_list.en: existing or possessing a specified characteristic only in comparison to something else

examination_example.sentence: One reason their pay has gone up so much is that CEOs really have upped their game <highlight>relative</highlight> to many other workers in the U.S. economy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首席执行官们薪水上涨如此之快的原因之一就是他们在美国经济中的确比其他工人做出了更多努力。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: existing or possessing a specified characteristic only in comparison to something else

examination_example.sentence: Value is almost never absolute; rather, we decide an object's value <highlight>relative</highlight> to our other choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 价值几乎从来不是绝对的；相反，我们总是相较于其它选项来决定一件物品的价值。

sense_info_list.en: a person related by blood or marriage; a species related to another by common origin

examination_example.sentence: We even share some basic instinctual quantitative reasoning with distant non-mammalian <highlight>relatives</highlight> like birds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们甚至与像鸟类这样的非哺乳动物远亲分享一些基本的本能定量推理。

examination_example.sentence: When your elderly <highlight>relative</highlight> needs to enter some sort of long-term care facility—what you would like is to have everything made clear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你的老年亲属需要进入某种长期护理机构时——你希望的是把一切都弄清楚。

sense_info_list.en: considered in relation or in proportion to something else

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Tim got four toys from his <highlight>relatives</highlight> on Children's Day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 儿童节那天，蒂姆从亲戚那里得到了四个玩具。

examination_example.sentence: In China, when we invite friends or <highlight>relatives</highlight>, we always treat them to a big dinner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在中国，当我们邀请朋友或亲戚时，我们总是请他们吃一顿大餐。

examination_example.sentence: What will Tony do for his <highlight>relatives</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 托尼会为他的亲戚做什么？

examination_example.sentence: The amount of money is <highlight>relative</highlight> to your relationship to the person.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 钱的数量与你和这个人的关系有关。

examination_example.sentence: The different parts of the brain <highlight>relative</highlight> to writing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大脑中与写作相关的不同部分。

examination_example.sentence: What Karibe found was increased activity in the areas of the brain <highlight>relative</highlight> to auditory processing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Karibe发现大脑中与听觉处理相关的区域活动增加了。
